Itzli the Sahuagin Baron snarls as he searches for the prince's mask!
Baron Itzli stops following Ichi.

Pleased at the destruction of his rival, Itzli retrieves the fallen
prince's mask. As Itzli dons the bronze mask, he screeches wildly with
pleasure! Now a prince of the Sahuagin, Itzli turns to you,

        'Well done, my minion. Continue to serve me, and you shall be
    richly rewarded. For now, you may help yourself to whatever remains on
    the corpses of my brother and his priestess.

        'Within the depths of the oceans to the east, my people have
    founded a great civilization. There, our society has flourished for
    generations by the strength of our blood. I aim to fight my way to
    the top, but the reigning King of the Sahuagin is protected by a
    power I do not understand yet.

        'The tunnel leading to the east is closed for now, but once is
    is open again, you shall have a chance to prove your worth to me by
    finding the source of the King's power.'

Prince Itzli kneels and searches the area where his brother fell. He finds
a small key, which he picks up and hangs around his neck. As Prince Itzli
stands back up, he dismisses you from his presence.

An elite sahuagin guard swims in from the north.
An elite sahuagin guard now follows Prince Itzli.

563H 97V 21633962X 0.00% 13679C Mem:1 Exits:U> 
Summoning all of your courage, you pray for luck and swim towards the dark
crevice, kicking up a cloud of sediments behind you.

As you make your way through the crevice, you find yourself feeling along
blindly through pitch darkness. You panic as you realize the dark passage
is getting narrower and your gear starts to snag on a few protrusions of
stone each time you are forced to squeeze through.

Distracted by your struggles, you suddenly realize that you have passed
through the tightest parts of the passage as the stone surfaces begin to
pull away from you and the salty water starts to feel less oppressive.

You emerge to find yourself at the bottom of an underwater canyon.

555H 101V 21467388X 9.55% 15505C Exits:ESW> 
Spell    : Aura of Command
Sphere   : Combat
Usage    : cast 'aura of command' (aura)
Duration : Varies
Effects  : Makes the caster more inspiring.

This spell creates a prestigious aura around the caster that affects the
entire group, increasing the charisma and wisdom of all group members who
are closely aligned with the caster. Additionally, this spell grants
protection against certain mind-affecting spells.

555H 101V 21467388X 9.55% 15505C Exits:ESW> 
You utter the words, 'aura of command'
You stand tall and proud, ready to lead your companions to battle.

555H 101V 21467388X 9.55% 15505C Exits:ESW> 
Spell    : Holy Quest
Sphere   : Combat
Usage    : cast 'holy quest'
Duration : 24 hours
Effects  : Increases the rate at which the caster gains faith

By casting this spell the caster sets out a holy quest against evildoers.
As a result, the caster will find it easier to gain perfect faith when
fighting evil opponents. Vanquishing particularly evil foes, such as unholy 
dragons and clerics of Takhisis, will have a massive impact to the caster's 
faith.

546H 99V 21466712X 14.14% 15863C [Scratchy the fearsome blue dragon:Good] [a haughty dargonesti lord:V.Bad] Exits:NESW> 
Tall and haughty, this dargonesti lord swims purposefully through the wide
streets of Darthalla on some sort of business that he obviously considers
very important. He ignores everyone around him except his lady, whom he
speaks with in a hushed and hurried tone. He looks like he does not want

546H 99V 21466712X 19.23% 16120C Mem:2 Exits:NS> 
Significantly larger than most other dolphins, the star-nose dolphin still
moves through the water with a silent and deadly grace. There is a subtle
purple tint to his otherwise gray body which enables him blend in with his
surroundings despite his large size. He bears a few long scars on his back,
suggesting that this war dolphin has seen his fair share of battles. His
ivory white beak is long and tapered. It looks quite capable of delivering
brutally painful blows to the war dolphin's unsuspecting foes.
Ivory Lancer the war dolphin is in an excellent condition.

THE RIGHTEOUS WILL SKILL
Format: RIGHTEOUS WILL

In moments of desperate struggle, some paladins have reported going entirely
blank. They see, hear and feel nothing for the briefest period of time. When
they snap out of it, the willpower of the gods has taken them over, they are
able to withstand greater amounts of damage and survive.

A thing to behold, it doesn't happen often, but the strength of their will
has been reported to last hours.

**Village of Mortigoth

Straightfoward kill everything zone with a lot of dts, so be scanning.  The ogre 
leader loads 'a sword of carved obsidian' (3d6 1/1 lblade prime antigood) and a 
few other misc items.  The cave wyrm loads 'a wicked wyrm tooth dagger' (decent 
thiefy offhand piercer).  Further in, the evil treant can load 'a treant leaf 
potion' (norent heal/barkskin potion).  The ogre patrol leader inside the 
village can load 'a pair of razor-lined gloves' (+dam handworn), and 'a shirt of 
black chainmail or somesuch' (+str bodyworn).  The ogre shaman west of the city 
can load 'a human bone ring' (-5hp +wis ring), and 'a thick, woolen cloak' (+5hp 
aboutworn).  Grisk, the ogre leader can load 'a collosal battle axe' (3d6 3/3 
axe prime) and the items also loaded by the 2nd patrol leader.  Once all the 
ogres in the village have been killed, you can free the mayor east/north of the 
square to receive 500-700k exp for a good aligned char.
